0: Hotel reception help with Reservation of several tours and dinner
We experienced great hospitality amp a wonderful breakfast every morning
Check in room service and bar were great
The hotel is extremely well located next to all the top attractions restaurants and the Palladium shopping mall
The breakfast was tasty plentiful with lots of variety
The hotel was conveniently located the bed was of the excellent standard we expect from the Acor group and the breakfast was delicious and of outstanding quality
The room in which breakfast was served was charming with an open kitchen where you could see breakfast foods being cooked

We had booked a room with breakfast breakfast was served downstairs and you could choose to eat inside or out food was good plenty to eat and a wide choice from cereals porridge breads and rolls fruit and hot cooked food such as sausages bacon mushrooms and egg
The breakfast is excellent with all needs catered for
Clean and close to the city center Welcoming staff Very diverse breakfast
1: We were also given a voucher for a free drink at the hotel bar
Breakfast was plentiful with a wide choice of both hot and cold foods
2: After the first morning they had the breakfast ready for me everyday at the time I wanted it
We got a ground level room so we had a small terrace opposite the in property restaurant
The restaurant was closed which I found shocking as it was supposed to be open Monday through Sunday according to the hotel website
My only complaints and the reason I did not give a higher rating are the lack of a fitness centre and the high cost of breakfast
The renovated bar makes it even more attractive
not great when you are holding a plate of food
We were asked to pay for breakfast on day 4 but we refused and the matter was quickly sorted out
The bar keeper did a great job too and mixed two tasty drinks
The bar downstairs was a small and intimate lounge that was perfect for an after a long day cocktail at very reasonable prices not to mention the daily afternoon happy hour
The bar is nice but different attitude from bartender
